text: Hayk "Hayko" Hakobyan (; 25 August 1973 â€“ 29 September 2021) was an Armenian singer. He represented Armenia in the 2007 Eurovision Song Contest in Helsinki. He performed "Anytime You Need" and came in eighth place in the contest. He was born in Yerevan, Armenia. Hayko died on 29 September 2021, in Yerevan, from COVID-19 at aged 48. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Armenia Category:Armenian singers
title: Hayko
